Sentencas: ABO(3) perovskites are oxide materials that are used for a variety of applications such as solid oxide fuel cells, piezo-, ferro-electricity and water splitting.
Titulo: High-throughput DFT calculations of formation energy, stability and oxygen vacancy formation energy of ABO3 perovskites

Sentencas: Due to their remarkable stability with respect to cation substitution, new compounds for such applications potentially await discovery.
Titulo: High-throughput DFT calculations of formation energy, stability and oxygen vacancy formation energy of ABO3 perovskites

Sentencas: In this work, we present an exhaustive dataset of formation energies of 5,329 cubic and distorted perovskites that were calculated using first-principles density functional theory.
Titulo: High-throughput DFT calculations of formation energy, stability and oxygen vacancy formation energy of ABO3 perovskites

Sentencas: In addition to formation energies, several additional properties such as oxidation states, band gap, oxygen vacancy formation energy, and thermodynamic stability with respect to all phases in the Open Quantum Materials Database are also made publicly available.
Titulo: High-throughput DFT calculations of formation energy, stability and oxygen vacancy formation energy of ABO3 perovskites

Sentencas: This large dataset for this ubiquitous crystal structure type contains 395 perovskites that are predicted to be thermodynamically stable, of which many have not yet been experimentally reported, and therefore represent theoretical predictions.
Titulo: High-throughput DFT calculations of formation energy, stability and oxygen vacancy formation energy of ABO3 perovskites

Sentencas: The dataset thus opens avenues for future use, including materials discovery in many research-active areas.
Titulo: High-throughput DFT calculations of formation energy, stability and oxygen vacancy formation energy of ABO3 perovskites
